outputs.output_descr:
OUTPUT 1  - A STABLE AND CREDIBLE ELECTORAL ENVIRONMENT  including (a) increased capacity of national institutions in contributing to well-organized and credible electoral processes compliant with democratic principles and electoral standards and (b) increased awareness of electoral actors on a renewed regulatory framework.
OUTPUT 2 - INCREASED PARTICIPATION OF CITIZENRY IN DECISION-MAKING through institutionalizing awareness raising approach on electoral processes among youth and various vulnerable groups.

OUTPUT 1  - A STABLE AND CREDIBLE ELECTORAL ENVIRONMENT  including (a) increased capacity of national institutions in contributing to well-organized and credible electoral processes compliant with democratic principles and electoral standards and (b) increased awareness of electoral actors on a renewed regulatory framework.
OUTPUT 2 - INCREASED PARTICIPATION OF CITIZENRY IN DECISION-MAKING through institutionalizing awareness raising approach on electoral processes among youth and various vulnerable groups.

project_descr: Promoting Sustainability of Stable and Credible Electoral Institutions and Processes
